text: “Ezɨ namba 7ɨn iakɨnimɨn, an dughiar namba 15ɨn, ia faragh dagher faragha aniziba inigh gɨvagh, egh ia Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn dughiar ekiar kam damuam, an aruer namba 15ɨn ikegh, 7plan aruebar mangam. Dughiar kabar, ia averpenibar ikɨva na gɨnɨghnɨgham. Dughiar ekiar kamɨn aruer faragha zuim ko namba 8 aruemɨn, ia bar avughsɨ.
